messages.subject: Introduction New Member
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, I have two children, Karl (age 2 TODAY), and Jacien age 5 months.  I may be starting early but I am exploring methods of homeschooling/ unschooling.  I am
messages.messageBody:
Hi,

I have two children, Karl (age 2 TODAY), and Jacien age 5 months. I may be starting early but I am exploring methods of homeschooling/ unschooling. I am new to all of it, and just want to get information. I have heard unschooling mentioned on other sites and I am interested in knowing more about it. I am new to natural parenting as well, and could use support with it.

I am mainly a lurker due to time constraints, but do want to introduce myself, and let ya'll know I will be reading and learning! Thank you!

Laura Creazzo
feychile113@...
www.stores.ebay.com/Laurasbooknookandcollectibles

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
